All Implemented Interfaces:

public class DottedTurtle
extends AbstractTurtle

Another implementation of Turtle that draws a series of circles in its wake.

Author:
Ilkka Kokkarinen

DottedTurtle

public DottedTurtle(double step,
                    double diam)
Constructor to determine the step size and the diameter of the circles that the turtle draws behind it.

Parameters:
step - The step distance between the consecutive circles.
diam - The diameter of each circle.
